<style>/*整体*/
.首页主区块 {
    background-color: #efefef;
    width: 750rpx;
    height: 1334rpx;
}
/*首页顶部*/
.首页顶部区域 {
    width: 100%;
    height: 250rpx;
    background-color: RoyalBlue;
}

.顶部标题 {
    width: 100%;
    height: 60rpx;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-size: 35px;
}

.顶部搜索 {
    margin-top: 20rpx;
    margin-bottom: 20rpx;
    margin-left: 20rpx;
    margin-right: 20rpx;
    height: 60rpx;
}

.顶部搜索按钮 {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    display: flex;
}
.搜索图标 {
    width: 40rpx;
    height: 40rpx;
    margin: 10rpx 0;
}
.搜索标题 {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    margin-left: 15rpx;
}

/*首页分类*/
.首页分类 {
    width: 100%;
    height: 200rpx;
    position: relative;
}
.首页分类子类 {
    position: absolute;
    top: 20rpx;
    left: 20rpx;
    height: 160rpx;
    width: 710rpx;
}
.首页分类子类1 {
    position: absolute;
    top: 20rpx;
    left: 20rpx;
    height: 120rpx;
    width: 325rpx;
    background-color: Yellow;
    border-radius: 10rpx;
}
.首页分类子类1标题 {
    position: absolute;
    display: flex;
    top: 30rpx;
    left: 37.5rpx;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    height: 60rpx;
    width: 250rpx;
    border-radius: 10rpx;
}

.首页分类子类2 {
    position: absolute;
    top: 20rpx;
    right: 20rpx;
    height: 120rpx;
    width: 325rpx;
    background-color: Yellow;
    border-radius: 10rpx;
}

/*首页招聘信息*/
.首页招聘信息 {
    margin-top: 20rpx;
    width: 100%;
}
.招聘信息背景图 {
    background-image: url("/static/1734003530142.jpg");
    background-size: cover;
}
.首页招聘信息子类 {
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: top;
    height: 300rpx;
    border-radius: 10rpx;
}
.左侧招聘信息子类 {
    width: calc(100% - 50% - 30rpx);
    margin-left: 20rpx;
    margin-right: 10rpx;
    background-color: White;
}
.右侧招聘信息子类 {
    width: calc(100% - 50% - 30rpx);
    margin-left: 10rpx;
    margin-right: 20rpx;
    background-color: White;
}
.招聘信息背景 {
    height: 70%;
    width: 100%;
    background-color: Pink;
    border-radius: 10rpx 10rpx 0 0;
}
.招聘信息标题 {
    height: 30%;
    width: 100%;
    border-radius: 0rpx 0rpx 10rpx 10rpx;
}
.招聘信息标题效果 {
    margin-left: 10rpx;
    margin-right: 10rpx;
    margin-top: 5rpx;
}
.招聘信息效果 {
    position: relative;
}
.薪资 {
    position: absolute;
    left: 10rpx;
    top: 25rpx;
}
.地址 {
    position: absolute;
    right: 10rpx;
    top: 25rpx;
}</style>
